name: rd-bedrock-nova
description: Amazon Bedrock Nova シリーズ + Clean Architecture + 12 Agent Factor

scripts.dev: echo '1. npm run sandbox (terminal 1)' && echo '2. npm run frontend:dev (terminal 2)'
scripts.sandbox:delete: cd infra/amplify && npx ampx sandbox delete
scripts.frontend:dev: npm run copy:amplify-config && npm run dev -w frontend
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w agents
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:agents && npm run test:e2e
